title: ELECTRIC CIRCUITS OR APPARATUS SPECIALLY DESIGNED FOR USE IN EQUIPMENT FOR KILLING, STUNNING, OR GUIDING LIVING BEINGS  (stationary means for catching or killing insects by electric means A01M1/22; apparatus for the destruction of noxious animals, other than insects, by electricity A01M19/00; electric traps for animals A01M23/38; scaring devices for animals A01M29/00; slaughtering or stunning by electric current A22B3/06)
definition_statement: This place covers: Constructional details and circuits of cattle electric fences or similar devices.

title: Circuits or apparatus for generating electric shock effects
definition_statement: This place covers: Electric fences for cattle or similar

title: Other circuits
definition_statement: This place covers: Monitoring circuits for electric fences or similar fencing structures, e.g. underwater structures
